dozer.markings: Classic boxer brindle/fawn coat, black muzzle and face mask, white chest patch
identification_rules: Only boxer on property — any boxer = Dozer
Stocky, muscular build with short muzzle

nona.size: Very large — tallest and heaviest horse on property (16-17 hands, ~2000 lbs)
nona.markings: NO white markings at all. Completely solid black.
identification_rules: Only draft horse on property — significantly larger than the other two horses
Solid black with zero white markings
Percheron build: heavy bone, feathered fetlocks, broad chest
In IR/night: largest silhouette by far

cruella.markings: White starburst/star marking on face. No leg markings.
identification_rules: Black horse with white star/blaze on face = Cruella
Smaller than Nona, similar size to Scooby
Face marking is key identifier — look for white on forehead/face
In IR/night: check face for lighter marking

scooby.markings: One white foot (sock/stocking). NO face markings.
identification_rules: Black horse with white foot but no face markings = Scooby
Look for one lighter/white lower leg
No white on face — distinguishes from Cruella
In IR/night: check legs for one lighter foot

unknown_dog_policy.rule: Any dog that is NOT a boxer = UNKNOWN DOG
unknown_dog_policy.notes: Only one dog (Dozer, a boxer) belongs on this property. Any other dog breed is a stray/intruder.
